alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 3:44PM PST until January 31 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will be in and near Ladd and Pyles Canyons.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
